overview: Madi is complaining about her sex life to Jillian. Jillian doesn't know what to say, so she responds with a kiss. Madi is surprised, but she's not saying no. Feeling how pliant Madi is, Jillian decides to take her advances to the next level.  Lulu loves the way Maya looks in her lingerie as they cuddle together. Soon Lulu's gentle caresses get increasingly more sensual and Maya turns over. The girls are now facing each other and have greater access to their most sensual spots.
title: Stealing My Brother's Girlfriend 2
